    @allure.story("01.获取用户基本信息")
    @allure.severity('normal')

    def test_1(self, login,Api_Token):
        '''
        1、用户登录系统
        2、查询用户基本信息

        ak, token, res = Api_Token

            data={
                'account':login['data']['account'],
                'password': login['data']['password'],
                'token':token,
                'publicKey':login['data']['publicKey']
    
            }
            res = ak.post(url=url, data=data)
            print(res.json())
